trans-unit.source: Interacts with the page parser to build HTML server controls that do not have a body or closing tag.
trans-unit.target: 与页分析器进行交互，以生成不具有主体或结束标记的 HTML 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The control interacts with the page parser to build HTML server controls that do not have a body or closing tag, such as ``, ``, ``, and ``.
trans-unit.target: 控件交互与页分析器，以生成 HTML 服务器控件没有正文或结束标记，如``， ``， ``，和``。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder.HasBody%2A> property always returns `false`, indicating that controls built with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder> control do not have closing tags.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder.HasBody%2A>属性始终返回`false`，，该值指示控件生成与<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder>控件时，没有结束标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder.%23ctor%2A> method is used internally by the ASP.NET page framework and is not intended to be called from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder.%23ctor%2A>方法由 ASP.NET 页面框架内部使用，但不适合从你的代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the controls built with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder" /> control do not have closing tags.
trans-unit.target: 指示使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder" /> 控件生成的控件不具有结束标记。
在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder.HasBody%2A> method overrides the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.HasBody%2A> method to always return `false`, because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder> class represents controls that do not have closing tags.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder.HasBody%2A>方法重写基类的<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.HasBody%2A>方法始终返回`false`，这是因为<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlEmptyTagControlBuilder>类表示没有结束标记的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.HasBody%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class determines whether a control has both an opening and a closing tag.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.HasBody%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>类可确定控件是否具有开始和结束标记。
